name: _subHuman
description:
Controls:
Walk: WASD/arrows
Open doors/get into a car: LMB
Talk to the NPC: E
Flashlight: F
You can always quit the game by clicking on the car.

I cut come things from the project to finish before the deadline - there was supposed to be some combat, better dialogues, 3 NPCs and little bit more details.
I also didn't finish the camera rotation script (which means you can do vertical 360 turn - don't do it). I hope you enjoy anyway.
